definitions.title: n.pr.m.
definitions.body: great-grandson of Cain Ge 4:18 = [[מְחִיׇּיאֵ֠ל]] v:Ge 4:18 (J; A LXXL in both Maihl, E Maouihl; cf. further Lag:Or. ii, 35 BN 96 (Maiouiahl) Bu:Urgesch.125).—(Etym. dub.; Thes:Add. 97 perhaps smitten of Ēl √ [[מחה]]; Bu:Urgesch. 128 Kerber:Eigennam, d. AT. 91 [[מְחַיִּיאֵל]], or [[מַחְיִיאֵל]] Ēl maketh alive; DHM:MV 10 thinks of n. pr. div. [[יאל]],—cf. Ph. n. pr. [[יאלפעל]], and CIS:i. 132, 4; esp. p. 163 b, = god [[יאל]] giveth life (against this Gray:Prop. N. 164)).
